first st of next round the half_double_crochet join is counted as a chain-2 join round 10 join e with slip_stitch to any corner chain-2 space chain 3 double_crochet in same space double_crochet in each half_double_crochet and chain-1 space to next corner chain-2 space 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in chain-2 space around omitting last 4 corner sts 2 double_crochet in beg chain-2 space join with half_double_crochet to top of beg chain-3 29 double_crochet per side 4 chain-2 round 11 chain 3 double_crochet in same space double_crochet in next 2 sts bpdc in next 5 sts double_crochet in next 5 sts bpdc in next 5 sts twice double_crochet in next 2 sts 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in next corner chain-2 space around omitting last 4 corner sts 2 double_crochet in beg corner chain-2 space join with half_double_crochet to top of beg chain-3 15 bpdc per side 18 double_crochet per side round 12 chain 3 double_crochet in same space bpdc in next 4 sts double_crochet in next 5 sts bpdc in next 5 sts 3 times omitting last bpdc 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in next corner chain-2 space around omitting last 4 corner sts 2 double_crochet in beg corner chain-2 space join with half_double_crochet to top of beg chain-3 18 bpdc per side 19 double_crochet per side round 13 chain 1 half_double_crochet single_crochet in same space single_crochet in each st to next corner chain-2 space single_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet in chain-2 space around omitting last 3 corner sts single_crochet in beg chain-2 space join with slip_stitch to beg half_double_crochet finish off 160 sts round 14 join c with single_crochet to any corner half_double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet in same st single_crochet in each st around and single_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet in each corner half_double_crochet join with slip_stitch to beg single_crochet finish off 168 sts weave in ends block note the nature of the post sts in the final rnds may produce wonky edges blocking is recommended for this design © 2018 melinda miller all rights reserved basket of berries copyright - this basket of berries
